scripts.local-ssl: ([ -d ssl ] || mkdir ssl) && cd ssl && curl -LO https://github.com/FiloSottile/mkcert/releases/download/v1.3.0/mkcert-v1.3.0-linux-amd64 && echo 1 && mv mkcert-v1.3.0-linux-amd64 mkcert && echo 2 && ls && pwd && chmod +x mkcert && echo 2.1 && mkcert -install && echo 3 && mkcert %FSBEACON_DOMAIN% && echo 4
scripts.ssl: ([ -d ssl ] || mkdir ssl) && cd ssl && mkcert %FSBEACON_DOMAIN%
scripts.start-dev: cross-env HTTPS=true FSBEACON_DOMAIN=localhost ROOT_PATH=%ROOT_PATH% yarn start
